1.0.name: wordpress/adspace-platform
1.0.description:
Manage and monetize all your virtual ad spaces for FREE using Adspace Platform! This plugin displays a banner and/or advertise with us button on your WordPress website using Adspace Platform API allowing you to manage and sell your ad spaces effectively.

For more information, check out Adspace Platform.

Features include:

  • Adspace MarketPlace™ - the ability to buy and sell ads thru our Adspace MarketPlace™.
  • Unlimited Ad Spaces - manage and monetize all your ad spaces using our platform with no limitations.
  • Receive Payments Directly - the option to receive payments directly to your PayPal account instantly after someone purchases one of your adspaces using PayPal or PayPal Adaptive Payments, which basically bypasses the middle-man along with any unnecessary additional payment gateway fees and/or holds that could have been incurred other
